entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle this morning and early this afternoon. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light late this afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:00 AM MDT Wednesday 10 May 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill near minus 6. Forecast issued 3:00 AM MDT Wednesday 10 May 2023
